title: Sex Offender Public Disclosure - Learning from the UK pilots & international research
abstractText:
The “Public disclosure of Sex Offender” Knowledge Exchange grant is a collaboration of 3 Universities and 10 partners.

The project brings together a range of different Criminal Justice agencies, practitioners, charities and NGO’s in a number of different events including seminars, online discussions, and a conference to discuss the use of sex offender public disclosure in the UK, and its contribution to public protection, offender management, and sex offender management.

The project will identify best practice, discuss common and specific issues relating to the scheme in the UK, as well as provide evidence based advice on future policy development.
organisation: University of the West of England
